product_name: CamelBak Elixir Electrolyte Hydration Tablets - 12 Servings
long_description: The reservoir-friendly CamelBak Elixir tablets will take your outdoor hydration to the next level. Blend of electrolytes, vitamins and minerals help maintain body fluid balance to keep you on the go. Self-dissolving effervescent tablets are designed for use with hydration reservoirs; 1 tablet per 16 oz. of water. Sugar-free formula leaves no residue, which makes cleaning your reservoir easy. CamelBak Elixir tablets are stored in a 4.25 x 1.25 in. plastic tube that easily fits into a backpack or jacket pocket. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: The reservoir-friendly CamelBak Elixir tablets will take your outdoor hydration to the next level.
